title: Client stuck on authenticating [Mac OS]
body:
Hi everybody,
when i tried to log in, it stuck on authenticating forever. Then, when I quit the client, the client doesn't even start; the icon of the client just start jumping. I tried reinstall the game, restore my Mac.
Help Pls. Thank You

replies.body:
When it wouldn't let you login, I'm curious if [**firewalls might have been blocking your network**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3), but it sounds like I've got a bigger problem to tackle with the client not opening at all now! 

It sounds like your Mac might not have the right admin settings in place to let League launch normally now (weird that it worked at first but it won't now =\ ). Let's get those updated really quickly with [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), and let me know if it doesn't work!

I'm having the same issue, wondering if anyone has found a solution yet. I've reinstalled the whole app twice now, I've played with security settings, network settings, I've updated my macbook, I've used the Hextech tool and it gets stuck while reading the R3D logs. 

My game is stuck at authenticating and will not let me connect.

My internet connection is strong.

Let me know if anyone has found a solution. Thanks!

I have the same problem on two MACs! A Windows PC don't have that problem.
Sometimes it helps to restart my router. After many tries to start the client it works. I have to wait a long time, than it reconnects, but not all moduls are loaded. So I see no quests i.e.

In my opinion, there is a communication issues. I tried to reinstall, but it didn't worked either. Than I connect the Mac to my iPad and used 4G to connect. That was successful without any problems, so it can't be a issue with the client itself. ...

PS: @823543 you have the bumping icon, because a process of lol did not finished at that time. You have to kill it or wait a minute or so.

I can't seem to connect to the authentication servers either. (Also using a mac.)

I've tried port forwarding, re-installing, checking firewalls, resetting modem, running as admin.. When I login all I get are errors and request timeouts.  The only success I've had is from using a free VPN when I sign in. It works, but adds 100+ms which is pretty much unplayable for me...

If anyone has any tips that'd be awesome.
